about.title: Welcome to Shri Samarth Hospital
about.p1: Shri Samarth Hospital is a 40-bed multi-specialty healthcare center in Shirur, Pune. We are committed to providing the best medical care with modern technology and a team of experienced and specialist doctors.
about.p2: Our goal is to deliver safe, affordable, and high-quality healthcare to every patient with compassion and integrity.

departments.title: Our Departments / Specialties
departments.intro: Our hospital offers specialized departments with highly trained professionals and state-of-the-art medical facilities to address all your health needs.

cardiology.name: Cardiology & BP Management
cardiology.desc: Heart care, ECG/ECHO, hypertension diagnosis and control.

ortho.name: Orthopedics
ortho.desc: Bone, joint and spine care, injuries and rehabilitation.

medicine.name: General Medicine & Diabetes Care
medicine.desc: Comprehensive internal medicine and diabetic management.

pediatrics.name: Pediatrics
pediatrics.desc: Child health, vaccinations, growth and development care.

dialysis.name: Dialysis Unit
dialysis.desc: Safe and monitored hemodialysis with trained specialists.

emergency.name: 24x7 Emergency & Accident Dept.
emergency.desc: Round-the-clock emergency response and trauma care.

emergency.title: 24x7 Emergency & Hospital Services
emergency.desc: Round-the-clock emergency care and trauma response with rapid ambulance support.

cashless.title: Cashless Insurance Facility Available
cashless.desc: Seamless TPA coordination with support for major insurance providers.

specialists.title: Experienced Specialist & Super-Specialist Doctors
specialists.desc: Board‑certified experts delivering evidence‑based, compassionate care.

icu.title: Advanced ICU & Operation Theatre
icu.desc: Modern ICUs and OTs with infection control and continuous monitoring.

wards.title: Separate Wards for Male & Female Patients
wards.desc: Privacy-focused wards and rooms designed for comfort and safety.

inhouse.title: In-house Medical & Lab Services
inhouse.desc: Pathology, diagnostics and pharmacy — all under one roof for faster care.

aboutMain.bannerSubtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Health, Always
aboutMain.story_p1: Shri Samarth Hospital is a trusted 40-bed multi-specialty hospital established to serve the communities of Chaufula, Wajewadi, Pimple Jagtap, and the surrounding areas in Shirur, Pune.
aboutMain.story_p2: With a strong focus on patient satisfaction and ethical practices, we combine advanced treatment methods with experienced, compassionate doctors to ensure every patient receives personalized care and attention across our multiple departments.
aboutMain.mission_p1: To provide ethical, affordable, and high-quality healthcare to all, embodying our motto:
aboutMain.vision_p: To be the most trusted and patient-focused hospital in the Shirur region, delivering advanced medical treatment with a compassionate, human touch.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.desc: Caring deeply for every patient's well-being.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: Maintaining high medical standards in every procedure.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: Honest, transparent and ethical in all our practices.

service.title: Service
service.desc: Putting the patient's needs first, always.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.desc: Working together for better health outcomes.

aboutMain.teamDesc: Our dedicated team of specialist doctors, nurses, and support staff work around the clock to provide the highest quality of care, ensuring your comfort and speedy recovery.

trust.heroTitle: Our Legacy of Care: The Sharada Foundation's Commitment to Health
trust.heroDesc: Shri Samarth Hospital is a dedicated initiative by the Sharada Foundation, built on a mission of providing compassionate and accessible healthcare. We bring trusted medical expertise and state-of-the-art technology to the communities of Shirur, Chaufula, Wajewadi, and beyond, ensuring that quality care is always within reach.
trust.communityDesc: At Shri Samarth Hospital, we believe in giving back. We are committed to uplifting our community through regular free health check-up camps, blood donation drives, and wellness awareness programs. Our goal is to touch thousands of lives and promote a healthier future, even beyond the walls of our hospital.
trust.ctaDesc: Chat directly with our hospital representatives on WhatsApp for quick information and scheduling. We provide confidential guidance to make healthcare more accessible.
trust.specialtiesDesc: Explore our comprehensive range of expert medical departments dedicated to your complete well-being.
trust.roomsTitle: Accommodations Designed for Your Comfort & Healing
trust.roomsDesc: We offer a range of comfortable and well-maintained rooms to suit your needs and ensure a peaceful recovery.

private.title: Private Rooms
private.desc: Complete privacy and a quiet environment with personal amenities.

semi.title: Semi-Private Rooms
semi.desc: Cost-effective option with essential amenities shared between two patients.

deluxe.title: Deluxe Rooms
deluxe.desc: Enhanced comfort and extra amenities for a more pleasant stay.

ward.title: General Wards
ward.desc: Clean and well-managed wards, separate for male and female patients.
